art_of_forging.effect.decaying.tooltip: Applies a withering effect to the target at §e%s potency§r for §e%s seconds§r.
art_of_forging.effect.stormcaller.toolti: Summon §e%s lightning bolts§r at the same time at hit with a §e%s chance§r.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:stormca: Summons lightning bolts§r at the same time at hit
art_of_forging.effect.evoking_maw.toolti: Summons §e%s evoker fangs at the same time at hit.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:evoking: Summons evoker fangs at the same time at hit
art_of_forging.effect.life_steal.tooltip: Chance to gain §e%s health§r back after a successful hit (§e%s chance).
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:life_st: Chance to gain health back after a successful hit
art_of_forging.effect.knockback.tooltip: Knocks back target by an additional §e%s strength§r (This effect can also be reversed to drag targets in).
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:knockba: Knocks back target by an additional amount
art_of_forging.effect.life_fiber_loss.to: On the death of your opponent, you get buffed for §e%s seconds.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:life_fi: On the death of your opponent, you gain buffs
art_of_forging.effect.cavalry.tooltip: Does an bonus §e%s damage§r while riding an entity.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:cavalry: Does an bonus damage while riding an entity
art_of_forging.effect.dismounting.toolti: Does an bonus §e%s damage§r to mounted entities, with a §e%s chance§r to dismount them.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:dismoun: Does an bonus damage to mounted entities, with a chance to dismount them
art_of_forging.effect.dragon_mist.toolti: A mist that lasts for §e%s seconds§r with a §e%s chance§r to be summoned.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:dragon_: A mist that has a chance to be summoned
art_of_forging.effect.disorienting.toolt: Inflicts slowness, weakness and confusion at §e%s potency§r, that lasts for §e%s seconds§r.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:disorie: Inflicts slowness, weakness and confusion at §e%s potency§r, that lasts for §e%s seconds§r
art_of_forging.effect.vengeance.tooltip: You deal §e%s percent more damage§r, at §e%s hearts or less§r.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:vengean: You deal more damage at low health
art_of_forging.effect.resolve.tooltip: You gain strength and resistance for §e%s seconds§r, at §e%s hearts or less§r.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:resolve: You gain strength and resistance at low health
art_of_forging.effect.devouring.tooltip: If you do not attack any entity for a period of time, your item will begin to consume your life force.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:devouri: If you do not attack any entity for a period of time, your item will begin to consume your life force
art_of_forging.effect.infernal_rebuke.to: Sets enemies on fire for §e%s seconds§r and knocks them back, with a §e%s chance§r to do so.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:inferna: Sets enemies on fire and knocks them back, with a chance to do so
art_of_forging.effect.hubris.tooltip: At 90 percent health or greater, you deal §e%s extra damage§r. However, upon losing health, your weapon damage decreases until more than half its original damage at 30 percent or lower.
At full health you deal extra damage, however, the lower your health is the less damage you deal
art_of_forging.effect.slaughtering.toolt: You deal §e%s extra damage§r when your target is above §e%s percent health§r.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:slaught: You deal extra damage when your target is above a certain amount of health
art_of_forging.effect.carnage.tooltip: As you attack your target, you gain a 10 percent bonus in damage. For each consecutive attack, 10 percent more damage is added up to 40 percent. This stack is lost upon death.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:carnage: As you attack your target, you gain bonus damage that is stacked for each attack until your death
art_of_forging.effect.judgement.tooltip: If you enemy is below §e%s health§r, you have a §e%s percent chance§r to instantly kill them.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:judgeme: If you enemy is below a certain amount of health, you have a chance to instantly kill them
art_of_forging.effect.retribution.toolti: You deal §e%s damage§r when you are attacked, with a §e%s percent chance§r harm your attacker.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:retribu: You deal more damage when you are attacked, with a chance harm your attacker
art_of_forging.effect.esoteric_edge.tool: §e%s percent of your damage§r is converted into magic damage.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:esoteri: A percentage of your damage is converted into magic damage
art_of_forging.effect.feasting.tooltip: Regain hunger by §e%s amount§r, with a §e%s percent§r to take effect.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:feastin: Regain hunger by a certain amount with a chance to take effect
art_of_forging.effect.nano_fused.tooltip: You have a §e%s chance§r to have an altered drops from certain mobs.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:nano_fu: You have a chance to have an altered drops from certain mobs
art_of_forging.effect.beheading.tooltip: You have a §e%s chance§r to drop a mob or player skull upon death.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:beheadi: You have a chance to drop a mob or player skull upon death
art_of_forging.effect.soul_charged.toolt: Upon killing an entity, you gain 1 soul charge point. Once you gain 5 points, you are able to release a wave of fire and magic damage in a radius around you. Requires ability level 2 or greater.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:soul_ch: Upon killing an entity, you gain 1 charge point. On gaining max points, release a wave of fire and magic damage around you
art_of_forging.effect.sonic_shock.toolti: Release a sonic boom attack that deals §e%s damage§r to the target.
Reduces incoming magic damage by §e%s§r upon wearing.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:arcane_: Reduces incoming magic damage upon wearing
art_of_forging.effect.karma_infused.tool: Based on what you've killed, you will receive luck or bad luck for §e%s§r seconds upon wearing, each with increasing potency for your deeds.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:karma_i: Based on what you've killed, you will receive either good luck or bad luck
art_of_forging.effect.third_sight.toolti: Grants glowing for §e%s§r seconds on any living entity you have damaged.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:third_s: Grants glowing on any living entity you have damaged
art_of_forging.effect.conquering.tooltip: Holding this weapon grants you strength, while weakening your opponents on hit. When reaching the max amount of kills, you gain increased strength at the cost of reduced max health.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:conquer: Holding this weapon grants you strength, while weakening your opponents on hit.
art_of_forging.effect.subjugation.toolti: Constantly attacking a target for 10 hits straight allows you to unleash a charged, targeted attack, giving the target blindness, slowness, and weakness. This attack also heals you.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:subjuga: Constantly attacking a target allows you to unleash a targeted attack that inflicts debuffs and steals their life
art_of_forging.effect.goliath_slayer.too: Deals §e%s§r more damage to bosses or boss-like entities.
tetra.stats.art_of_forging_miapi:goliath: Deals more damage to bosses or boss-like entities
item.enigmatic_construct.tooltip: A strange machination constructed from the maimed soul of the Ender Dragon. It feels wrong.
item.life_fiber.tooltip: A synthetic replica of the real deal.
item.ancient_item.tooltip: An weapon forged long ago. It requires malicious energy to be reawakened.
tetra/schematic/rapier.description:
Replace the current sword blade with a rapier, an elegant blade.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
miapi.module.aof_blade_rapier.descriptio: A light, swift and elegant blade.
miapi.module.aof_blade_crucible.descript: Rip and Tear, until it is done.
miapi.module.aof_blade_tomahawk.descript: A tomahawk axe head, can be thrown at enemies to attack them
miapi.module.aof_blade_halberd.descripti: A halberd head, an ideal ranged melee weapon that grants stun and armor penetration.
miapi.module.aof_guard_key.description: A key guard which both protects the hand, as well as gives the player a special moxxy in their attitude.
miapi.module.aof_mace_head.description: A mace head, a strong melee weapon, capabile of stunning enemies and crushing their armor.
miapi.module.aof_dreadnought_stave.descr: A dreadnought bow stave. Dreadnought staves are more powerful than typical bow staves.
miapi.module.aof_blade_void_worm_pickaxe: A pickaxe head made from the Void Worm mandibles, nothing personal kid.
miapi.module.aof_blade_shifting.descript: A strange blade made from amethyst blocks. Its properties give it a magical edge.
miapi.module.aof_blade_rending_scissor_r: A scissor blade made from hardened Life Fibers.
miapi.module.aof_blade_rending_scissor_p: A scissor blade made from hardened Life Fibers.
miapi.module.aof_cane_head.description: A walking cane, a verastile utility tool used to aid in movement. Holding it allows you to increase your movement speed for travel
A crossbow stave made from a planar stabilizer. This stave can fire multiple arrows at once, as well as dragging entities towards you.
miapi.module.aof_quarter_staff_head.desc: A quarter staff, used for close combat for quick strikes and the ability to block. It can also stun opponents for a short amount of time
miapi.module.aof_compound_string.descrip: A compound string. It is more powerful than typical bow strings.
miapi.module.aof_blade_crossdreadnought_: A dreadnought crossbow stave. Dreadnought staves are more powerful than typical crossbow staves.
tetra/schematic/crossstave/dreadnought_c: Replaces the stave with a dreadnought stave crafted from the given materials. Dreadnought staves are more powerful than typical crossbow staves.
tetra/schematic/crosssocket.description: Solder a crossbow by carefully placing gemstones onto the stave, providing different effects depending on the gem.
miapi.module.aof_blade_crosssocket.descr: A gem, soldered carefully onto the stave of the crossbow. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder of the crossbow.
miapi.module.aof_blade_crosscompound_cro: A compound string. It is more powerful than typical bow strings.
miapi.module.aof_blade_echo_fuller.descr: A fuller crafted from an echo shard. It might spread sculk taint.
miapi.module.aof_blade_euclidean.descrip: An ancient dagger forged from a fragment of Eden. The night belongs to you.
miapi.module.aof_blade_annihilator_axe.d: An axe head forged from demonic essence solidified. It hungers for blood.
miapi.module.aof_blade_cataclysm.descrip: A blade forged from demonic essence solidified. It hungers for blood.
miapi.module.aof_blade_mourning_star.des: A flail forged from demonic essence solidified. It hungers for blood.
miapi.module.aof_blade_reaping_scythe.de: A reaping scythe head, can be used to behead enemies to take their skulls.
A scythe forged from the pure embers emitted from the Soul Sand Valley. All burns around it.
A hammer head forged from the shockwave chamber. It knocks enemies back and has a powerful slam attack, along with a chance to summon lightning.
miapi.module.aof_blade_slime_hammer.desc: A hammer head made from fun, squishy slime. Not intended as a weapon.
miapi.module.aof_blade_eerie_fuller.desc: A fuller crafted from an eerie shard dropped by the Warden. It allows the user to produce their own sonic boom.
miapi.module.aof_blade_tonal.description: A blade tuned into the resonant frequency of living beings.
miapi.module.aof_remembrance_stave.descr: A bow crafted using the strange magics of a foreign law. Used to fight and protect the world She cared about.
miapi.module.aof_blade_rending_scissor_c: A complete scissor blade made from hardened Life Fibers.
miapi.module.aof_blade_scissor_left.desc: A blade made to render fabric and sinew.
miapi.module.aof_blade_scissor_right.des: A blade made to render fabric and sinew.
tetra/schematic/artifact/casing/relic.de: Replace the current artifact casing with a relic, a casing that increases your charm slot by 1.
tetra/schematic/artifact/internal/orb.de: Replace the current artifact internal with an orb, an internal component that applies passive buffs.
tetra/schematic/artifact/attachment/bind: Replace the current artifact attachment with some bindings, a cosmetic feature.
A light crossbow stave. This stave is lighter than most crossbow staves, having a faster draw time at the cost of decreased damage.
tetra/schematic/crossstave/light_stave.d: Replaces the stave with a light crossbow stave crafted from the given materials. This stave is lighter than most crossbow staves, having a faster draw time at the cost of decreased damage.
A heavy crossbow stave. This stave is heavy than most crossbow staves, having increased damage at the cost of slower draw time.
tetra/schematic/crossstave/heavy_stave.d: Replaces the stave with a heavy crossbow stave crafted from the given materials. This stave is heavy than most crossbow staves, having increased damage at the cost of slower draw time.
A light crossbow stock. This lighter stock provides some integrity and hosts several of the mechanical parts of the crossbow. The lighter stock provides faster draw time, at the cost of lower durability and damage.
miapi.module.aof_guard_tsuba.description: A tsube guard which both protects the hand, as well well as granting the player extra armor toughness. Typically used in conjunction with katana blades.
tetra/schematic/katana/murasama.descript: Improve your katana into the legendary Murasama blade.
tetra.improvement.murasama_imprv.descrip: Allow your katana to take on the mantle of Murasama
tetra/schematic/basic_hammer/utilize.des: Utilize the head of tool to unlock a unique specialty within the module
tetra/schematic/basic_hammer/hone_radius: Increase the depth at which your hammer can tunnel.
Hone the depth improvement. The effect is increased to 27.
Further hone the depth improvement. The effect is increased to 36.
Further hone the depth improvement. The effect is increased to 45.
Further hone the depth improvement. The effect is increased to 54.
tetra/schematic/crucible/hone_vengeance_: Increase vengeance damage by 5 percent at low health.
Hone the vengeance improvement. Damage is up to 15 percent at low health.
Further hone the vengeance improvement. Damage is up to 20 percent at low health.
tetra.improvement.blade/infernal.descrip: Chance to set enemies ablaze and knock them back when hit.
tetra/schematic/flamberge/hone_infernal_: Set enemies ablaze for 3 seconds, with a 15 percent chance to occur.
Hone the infernal improvement. Set enemies ablaze for 4 seconds, with a 20 percent chance to occur.
Further hone the infernal improvement. Set enemies ablaze for 5 seconds, with a 25 percent chance to occur
Further hone the infernal improvement. Set enemies ablaze for 6 seconds, with a 30 percent chance to occur
tetra.improvement.soul_fire_hone/soul_fi: Increases fire and magic damage dealt
tetra/schematic/soul_fire_scythe/hone_so: Increases fire and magic damage dealt by the ability by 1.
Hone the soul fire improvement. Enemies stay on fire for 8 seconds (14 if double honed), while magic damage increases to 6 (9 if double honed).
Further hone the soul fire improvement. Enemies stay on fire for 10 (16 if double honed) seconds, while magic damage increases to 7 (10 if double honed).
tetra/schematic/crucible/architects_cruc: Improve your crucible into the true Architect's Crucible.
tetra.improvement.architect_imprv.descri: Allow your crucible to take on the mantle of the Architect's Crucible.
tetra/schematic/crucible/hone_esoteric_1: Increase esoteric edge damage by 5 percent.
tetra/schematic/crucible/hone_esoteric_2: Hone the esoteric edge improvement. Esoteric edge damage is up to 10 percent.
tetra/schematic/crucible/hone_esoteric_3: Further hone the esoteric edge improvement. Esoteric edge damage is up to 15 percent.
tetra.improvement.nano_fused.description: Infuse the weapon with a nano-insectoid, altering loot drops for specific mobs.
tetra/schematic/shared/hone_nano_fused_1: Infuse the weapon with a nano-insectoid, altering loot drops for specific mobs.
tetra/schematic/katana/thousand_cold_nig: Corrupt your katana into the legendary Thousand Cold Nights blade.
tetra.improvement.thousand_cold_nights_i: Allow your katana to become the Thousand Cold Nights blade.
tetra/schematic/head/halberd_head/serrat: Serrate the head. Attacks have a 30%% chance to cause the target to bleed for 4 damage over 2 seconds. Not effective against undead.
Hone the serrated improvement, increases the damage dealt to 8.
Further hone the serrated improvement, increases the damage dealt to 16.
tetra/schematic/head/halberd_head/temper: Temper the the blade, greatly increasing its hardness. Causes some of the damage dealt to ignore armor.
Hone the tempered improvement, increases the amount of damage that penetrates armor to 3.
Further hone the serrated improvement, increases the amount of damage that penetrates armor to 5.
tetra/schematic/crossstave/hone_damage_1: Hone the module to increase the overall damage.
tetra/schematic/crossstave/hone_damage_2: Further hone the damage improvement for this module.
tetra/schematic/crossstave/hone_damage_3: Further hone the damage improvement for this module.
tetra/schematic/crossstave/hone_damage_4: Further hone the damage improvement for this module.
tetra/schematic/crossstave/hone_damage_5: Further hone the damage improvement for this module.
Hone the module to increase the overall draw speed.
Further hone the draw speed improvement for this module.
Further hone the draw speed improvement for this module.
Further hone the draw speed improvement for this module.
Further hone the draw speed improvement for this module.
Increase damage against bosses by 25 percent.
Hone the goliath slayer improvement. Damage against bosses is up to 50 percent.
Further hone the goliath slayer improvement. Damage against bosses is up to 75 percent.
tetra.variant_category.reagent.label: Reagent

item.tetra.scroll.tonal.description: Contains knowledge on how to forge a tonal blade

tetra.variant.sword_socket/void_worm_eye:
A legendary Void Worm Eye, bound onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt.
 
A god does not fear death, thus provinding all of combined effects of the gems.
tetra.variant.double_socket/void_worm_ey:
A legendary Void Worm Eye, bound onto the side of the tool head.
 
A god does not fear death, thus provinding all of combined effects of the gems.
tetra.variant.single_socket/void_worm_ey:
A legendary Void Worm Eye, bound where the head meets the handle.
 
A god does not fear death, thus provinding all of combined effects of the gems.
Delve into the art of forging modules
tetra.advancements.scrolls.root.title: Hidden Secrets (§eAoF§r)
tetra.advancements.scrolls.root.descript: Find a scroll, the locate the Art of Forging schematics
art_of_forging.advancements.materials.ro: Create a resonant alloy mixture to begin forging new materials.
tetra.advancements.art_of_forging.rendin: Craft the red rending scissor blade.
Craft the purple rending scissor blade
tetra.advancements.art_of_forging.echo_f: Find an echo shard and use it as a sword fuller!
tetra.advancements.art_of_forging.eerie_: Slay a Warden using a nano-infused weapon, and take its coveted shard as a sword fuller!
tetra.advancements.art_of_forging.archit: Upgrade your Crucible blade to reveal its true power, into The Architect's Crucible
tetra.advancements.art_of_forging.murasa: Upgrade the katana blade into the legendary Murasama
tetra.advancements.art_of_forging.rememb: Craft a Remembrance stave using a Dark Orb
tetra.advancements.art_of_forging.euclid: Craft a Euclidean Dagger using a Sigil of Eden
tetra.advancements.art_of_forging.rendin: Craft a completed Rending Scissor blade

Find a compound bow string scroll
tetra.advancements.scrolls.get_scroll_re: If Only I Had Thorns Like A Thistle
Obtain the legendary Rending Scissors scroll
tetra.advancements.scrolls.get_scroll_ar: Obtain the ascendant Architect's Crucible scroll
art_of_forging.advancements.materials.fo: Smelt down some resonant alloy to created a Forged Steel ingot
art_of_forging.advancements.materials.vo: Find a vobrite crystal in a shipwreck
Create a Vobrivium ingot by infusing a Forged Steel ingot with a vobrite crystal
art_of_forging.advancements.materials.en: Create an Endsteel ingot by infusing a Forged Steel ingot with dragon's breath
art_of_forging.advancements.materials.fi: Find a demonic item in an Ancient City chest
Obtain all three of the demonic artifacts
art_of_forging.advancements.materials.si: Obtain a Sigil of Eden, occasionally dropped by the Wither

tetra.advancements.spelunking.find_canis: Find an Encoded Canister in a forged container
tetra.advancements.spelunking.find_codex: Find an Esoteric Codex in a forged container
tetra.advancements.spelunking.craft_arch: Craft The Architect's Apocrypha using an Encoded Canister and an Esoteric Codex
tetra.advancements.spelunking.shockwave_: Craft a Shockwave Hammer using a shockwave chamber
tetra.advancements.spelunking.devils_sou: Obtain a Dark Orb by defeating the Wither using a nano-infused item
tetra.advancements.spelunking.eerie_shar: Kill a Warden and obtain its eerie shard using a nano-infused item
item.tetra.scroll.art_of_forging.details:
§l§nThe Art of Forging§r
 Forging, the practice of forming metal into anything you desire. While previously a coveted practice that only the Ancient Smiths and Forge God could partake in, I have discovered a new method of creating your own tools. I release my knowledge onto you, in hopes that you will eventually forge your own masterpieces. §l§nFlamberges§r
 The flamberge. Not only impressive in use of battle but also one of stunning design. It carries the iconic waved blade, perfect for landing a blow that leaves your opponent bleeding. Perhaps of intentional, or unintentional design, one may hone the blade to set enemies ablaze once harmed. §l§nHalberds§r
 A strong, and classic weapon. Used primarily for siege, and for good reason; this weapon combines the traits of a blade, axe, and polearm into one. Best for penetrating the armor of your foes, as well as dismounting and damaging enemies from their mounts. §l§nMaces§r
 Maces; a deadly weapon to any armored opponent. This bludgeoning will ignore armor, leaving devastating blows. At the cost of speed, of course. A nasty weapon to have in your arsenal, a conqueror on the battlefield. §l§nDreadnought§r
 The dreadnought stave is the perfect blend of speed and fury, allowing the ranger to send down a barrage of arrows upon their enemies. Perfect for knocking down those who stand in your way, and perfect for enacting vengeance. This can be used on both standard bows and crossbows. §l§nKatana§r
 A blade hailing from the eastern most corners of this world. The combination of a balanced blade and careful craftsmanship, this blade is suitable for anyone wanting an quality weapon. A katana can cut down anything into shreds and shards. §l§nCompound String§r
 Compound strings, made by twining two bowstrings rather than just one. Although it slows down draw speed, it makes up for it with raw power, giving arrows a harder impact than a typical bowstring. Combining with a dreadnought stave is the perfect combination for ranged warfare. §l§nQuarry Hammer§r
 The hammer has hidden potential within it. By utilizing a specific niche within it, you can unlock the Quarry Hammer. This hammer is ideal for boring tunnels and holes, able to tear up the earth with little effort. If you want a tool that can make quick work of stones and ores, then you have found the perfect item for you. 
§l§nTonal Blade§r
 A blade, carefully formed with resemblance to an instrument, this weapon makes up for its low damage with it's unique ability. The blade is able to tune into an enemies' resonant frequencies, causing them to be disoriented for quite some time. §c§l§nThe Crucible§r
 §kThe page is incomprehensible and torn. Perhaps something is missing?§r
item.tetra.scroll.otherworldly.details: §l§nOTHERWORLDLY§r\n After toying with an abandoned ruined portal, I have managed to find a link between this world and other worlds across this foreign realm of reality.
item.tetra.scroll.true_crucible.details: §c§l§nThe Crucible§r\n The Crucible, a powerful blade forged from malice and spite. While a potent weapon on its own, forging it in the same fashion as The Architect did allows the blade to gain esoteric properties, coverting part of it's physical damage into the metaphysical.
